titles.title: Commemorating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the National Governors Association.
Commemorating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the National Governors Association.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the leadership of the nation's governors. Honors their contributions to American politics and society.
Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the founding of the National Governors Association.
